definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

pinyin: Bai3 you2 Jiao3 gen1 zhi1 zhou1

sentences.english: Very soon an asphalted road will end.
sentences.chinese: 很快柏油马路将走到尽头。

sentences.english: Most streets are laid with asphalt.
sentences.chinese: 多数街道是用柏油铺的。

sentences.english: It looks and feels like ordinary black, hard roadway.
sentences.chinese: 它的外观和质感都象是普通的黑色坚硬柏油路。

sentences.english: From here, you can walk along a concrete path, and then you will find an asphalt road.
sentences.chinese: 从这里沿着一条水泥路走，然后你会看到一条柏油路。

sentences.english: Try to find a flat asphalt road if possible.
sentences.chinese: 可能的话尽量选择平坦的柏油路面。

sentences.english: The asphalt playgrounds have been grassed over or sown with flowers.
sentences.chinese: 原来的柏油操场已经复上了草皮或种满了鲜花。

sentences.english: The pavement on the road is covered with black tar.
sentences.chinese: 这条能马路的人行道上铺的是黑色的柏油。

sentences.english: Fairy horse horse, no tarmac when oneself is immortal.
sentences.chinese: 仙马没有柏油路，到达仙马时己是下午。
他们正在用柏油涂料涂抹路灯柱。

sentences.english: At noon sharp the sun too soft asphalt road are all the.
sentences.chinese: 中午暴日晒得柏油马路都软绵绵的。

sentences.english: The young woman walks up a steep paved road on the outskirts of the city center. She feels the burn in her quads as she marches higher and higher.
sentences.chinese: 这个年轻的女子走在郊区一条陡峭的柏油路上。

sentences.english: The side tracks off the tarred road were rutted and uneven .
sentences.chinese: 柏油路面两边的辅道上布满车辙，凹凸不平。

sentences.english: Afreezing downpour washed the black asphalt street in front of the small-town bar.
sentences.chinese: 一场冰冷的暴雨冲洗着小城镇酒吧前的黑色柏油马路。

sentences.english: No four wheel vehicle nor spacious asphalt road.
sentences.chinese: 没有四轮车也没有宽敞的柏油路。

sentences.english: placed in a basket lined with tar, put in the river, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 他也被装在一个涂了柏油的篮子里，放在河边等等。

definition: to harden/hardening/sclerosis/fig. to become rigid or inflexible in opinions/to ossify
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
